author: Alex Sherman
title: The NBA's China crisis is another reminder of the dangers of Twitter for corporate leaders
description: Is it worth it for leaders in corporate America to express themselves freely if the repercussions can literally start international incidents?
content:
At the very top of Twitter's corporate values website, there's a statement: "We believe in free expression and think every voice has the power to impact the world."
